body_html:
Also note that it can be a little slow if the tensor is large (like in your case). You can use numpy-type slicing in the command, e.g.,

tfdbg> pt linear/linear/native_country/native_country_weights/embedding_lookup_sparse:0[500:1000]

This table contains a list of the commands and their option flags: https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/debugger#tfdbg_cli_frequently-used_commands
body_text:

body:
Also note that it can be a little slow if the tensor is large (like in your case). You can use numpy-type slicing in the command, e.g.,

tfdbg> pt linear/linear/native_country/native_country_weights/embedding_lookup_sparse:0[500:1000]

This table contains a list of the commands and their option flags: https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/debugger#tfdbg_cli_frequently-used_commands
